mapper.select: SELECT T_SR.USER_ID, T_SR.DATE_TIME ,T_S.SURVEY_TYPE_ID, T_SR.SURVEY_UID FROM MEMBERS as T_M INNER JOIN SURVEYRESULT AS T_SR ON T_M.USER_ID = T_SR.USER_ID INNER JOIN SURVEY AS T_S ON T_SR.SURVEY_UID = T_S.SURVEY_UID GROUP BY T_S.SURVEY_UID, T_SR.DATE_TIME, T_S.SURVEY_TYPE_ID, T_SR.SURVEY_UID ORDER BY T_SR.DATE_TIME DESC;
